message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping if you could lower the price a bit. I am willing to pay up to $120 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
